chapters.title: Chapter 2: Rhuidean
chapters.info: Jheran, p. 81 (60)—Brown haired clan chief of the Shaarad Aiel. He and Bael tend to say the same thing about many subjects, which makes the two of them uneasy since their clans were in blood feud. They eventually saw that this was the case, and resolved to end the centuries old blood feud between their two clans which Janduin attempted to end and Rand finally did.
